mapper.insert: insert into abdomen_us_result( unique_id, unique_id_lv1, unique_id_lv2, p900, patient_id, visit_id, exam_no, exam_name, gastric_mass, gastric_mass_number, gastric_mass_size, liver_mass, liver_mass_number, liver_mass_size, pancreatic_mass, pancreatic_mass_number, pancreatic_mass_size, renal_mass, renal_mass_number, renal_mass_size, colorectal_mass, colorectal_mass_number, colorectal_mass_size, lymphadenopathy, lymph_enlargement_site, ascites, data_version, data_db_source, data_table_source, data_field_source, created_at, creator, updated_at) values ( #{uniqueId}, #{uniqueIdLv1}, #{uniqueIdLv2}, #{p900}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{examNo}, #{examName}, #{gastricMass}, #{gastricMassNumber}, #{gastricMassSize}, #{liverMass}, #{liverMassNumber}, #{liverMassSize}, #{pancreaticMass}, #{pancreaticMassNumber}, #{pancreaticMassSize}, #{renalMass}, #{renalMassNumber}, #{renalMassSize}, #{colorectalMass}, #{colorectalMassNumber}, #{colorectalMassSize}, #{lymphadenopathy}, #{lymphEnlargementSite}, #{ascites}, #{dataVersion}, #{dataDbSource}, #{dataTableSource}, #{dataFieldSource}, #{createdAt}, #{creator}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: update abdomen_us_result set unique_id = #{uniqueId}, unique_id_lv1 = #{uniqueIdLv1}, unique_id_lv2 = #{uniqueIdLv2}, p900 = #{p900}, patient_id = #{patientId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, exam_no = #{examNo}, exam_name = #{examName}, gastric_mass = #{gastricMass}, gastric_mass_number = #{gastricMassNumber}, gastric_mass_size = #{gastricMassSize}, liver_mass = #{liverMass}, liver_mass_number = #{liverMassNumber}, liver_mass_size = #{liverMassSize}, pancreatic_mass = #{pancreaticMass}, pancreatic_mass_number = #{pancreaticMassNumber}, pancreatic_mass_size = #{pancreaticMassSize}, renal_mass = #{renalMass}, renal_mass_number = #{renalMassNumber}, renal_mass_size = #{renalMassSize}, colorectal_mass = #{colorectalMass}, colorectal_mass_number = #{colorectalMassNumber}, colorectal_mass_size = #{colorectalMassSize}, lymphadenopathy = #{lymphadenopathy}, lymph_enlargement_site = #{lymphEnlargementSite}, ascites = #{ascites}, data_version = #{dataVersion}, data_db_source = #{dataDbSource}, data_table_source = #{dataTableSource}, data_field_source = #{dataFieldSource}, created_at = #{createdAt}, creator = #{creator}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} where id = #{id}
